casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. OLIVER
v.
TURNER. 2018-0132 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 28, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Habeas Corpus. Writ allowed. Allowing the writ means only that a return is ordered. Respondent shall file a return of writ within twenty-one days of service of the petition, and petitioner may file a response within ten days after the return is filed. Petitioner's physical presence before the court is not required.
